body_html: @yuanhua8 First, quantize_graph.py seems no longer maintained, you could use transform_graph instead. Second, all nodes within a tf control loop need a property called "frame" to run properly, while quantization adding const nodes without "frame" will break it. So, it is necessary to add control input to make sure nodes having a correct "frame".
body_text: @yuanhua8 First, quantize_graph.py seems no longer maintained, you could use transform_graph instead. So, it is necessary to add control input to make sure nodes having a correct "frame".
body: @yuanhua8 First, `quantize_graph.py` seems no longer maintained, you could use `transform_graph` instead. Second, all nodes within a tf control loop need a property called "frame" to run properly, while quantization adding const nodes without "frame" will break it. So, it is necessary to add control input to make sure nodes having a correct "frame".
